title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted water.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated pecorino cheese.
Combine the spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Fry onions until golden, then add spices and tomatoes.
Add cream and grilled chicken to the sauce.
